metadata.title: CVE-2012-6617 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The prepare_sdp_description function in ffserver.c in FFmpeg before 1.0.2allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via vectorsrelated to the rtp format.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libav package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mythtv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
